name: Rough Night
description:
This is a short game with 8 different endings, game tells you very little so you have to go around and try not to die, the AI is a bit unfair but somewhat easy to outplay, for some people this game might be a trial and error.

I had 1 month to make this but i messed up and left gameplay to the last week, so it's a bit rough. (I chose theme 4 and i think i did all 3 bonus challange (maybe not the 2nd one))

There isn't any supernatural thing in this game, basic survival horror gameplay, you can crouch and jump and you need to stealth around. Playtime for all 8 endings i would say 30 mins, for 1 good-ish ending 5-10 mins.

The zip is 125mb and the game is 250mb.

Use WASD, Left CTRL, and Space Bar for movement (crouch is hold), E/LMB to interact.

V1.1: Main Menu UI scales with resolution, also the robber gave back the T to the title.

V1.4: added progress tracker, made AI detection not be Linear (y=x*x now), and made detection be frame independent, removed some useless faces and fixed tiny stuff, and "removed" that one ending.
